name: Chicks' Haven
description:
Chicks' Haven

Here is our submission for GMTK's 2021 GameJam  - "Joined Together!" - Would you help this poor hen bringing her babies back to safety? Try to save as much chicks as possible! Beware of the slime! He wants some chicken tenders for diner!

Your Goal! You have 2 min to save as many chicks as you can - bringing them back to daddy rooster! 

Rules are simple! Just use the arrow keys to move the hen to the eggs! Don't get caught by the slime!

Good luck !

Controls :

  • Arrow keys / WASD: move the hen

Note - We had a really great time during this jam. That's our second game using Unity and we're very proud of it :) - Feel free to let us know what you've thought of our tiny game!

Assets: https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm

Yurhi & Sh0rtCut457
